animeDescription: Mary Bell, a magical girl who looks like a girl around five years old, comes to the human world from a magical world called "Flower Magic World", and helps and encourages people.  (Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Hana no Mahoutsukai Mary Bell: Phoenix no Kagi']
